sentences.en: A small colour television was tuned to an afternoon soap opera.
sentences.cn: 一台小彩色电视机频道调在了一出下午的肥皂剧上。

sentences.en: Dennis had recently begun a successful career conducting opera in Europe.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯最近开始在欧洲担任歌剧指挥，事业发展得很成功。

sentences.en: Dennis had recently begun a successful career conducting opera.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯最近开始从事歌剧指挥的工作，并且非常成功。

sentences.en: He was a regular attender at the opera.
I love opera and last year I got tickets for Covent Garden.
sentences.cn: 我喜爱歌剧，去年我搞到几张科芬园皇家歌剧院的票。

sentences.en: If you have never been to an opera, you haven't lived.
sentences.cn: 要是从来没看过歌剧，那就枉过此生了。

sentences.en: Most people are familiar with this figure from Wagner's opera.
sentences.cn: 多数人都熟悉瓦格纳歌剧中的这一人物。

sentences.en: She's one of the leading lights in the opera world.
sentences.cn: 她是歌剧界的一位大腕。

sentences.en: The following year she joined the Royal Opera House.
sentences.cn: 次年她加入了皇家歌剧院。

sentences.en: The opera lacks the polish of his later work.
sentences.cn: 这部歌剧不及他晚期作品娴熟。

sentences.en: The Royal Opera is on tour.
sentences.cn: 皇家歌剧团正在巡回演出。

sentences.en: Tonight is the opening night of the opera.
sentences.cn: 今晚是这部歌剧的首演之夜。

sentences.en: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
Young conductors earn their spurs in a small orchestra or opera house.
sentences.cn: 年轻的指挥家们在小乐队或小歌剧院里崭露头角。
